title: Children's Playground, State-of-the-Art Fitness Room, Volleyball Court
description: Welcome to Centerville Pointe Apartments, a community that offers the premier townhomes and apartments in Garland, Texas. Our family-friendly community boasts two, three, and four-bedroom apartments and townhomes while providing a cozy neighborhood atmosphere near the vibrant Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex. Our residents enjoy amazing amenities throughout our gorgeous grounds as well as inside of their new home. With spacious floor plans, fully equipped kitchens, and accented perks including walk-in closets and private patios, you can experience the benefits of modern community living at Centerville Pointe Apartments. A resort-style swimming pool, a basketball and volleyball court, and a resident clubhouse are readily available for you to enjoy, and our 24-hour maintenance service ensures that you can always rest easy in our pet-friendly community. At Centerville Pointe Apartments, contemporary comfort and convenience go hand-in-hand.
Prices and availability are subject to change.

Our family-friendly community boasts two, three, and four-bedroom apartments and townhomes while providing a cozy neighborhood atmosphere near the vibrant Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex. Our residents enjoy amazing amenities throughout our gorgeous grounds as well as inside of their new home. With spacious floor plans, fully equipped kitchens, and accented perks including walk-in closets and private patios, you can experience the benefits of modern community living at Centerville Pointe Apartments. At Centerville Pointe Apartments, contemporary comfort and convenience go hand-in-hand.
Prices and availability are subject to change.
